Text.Name: SonOfDestiny
Text.DisplayName: ดวงชะตาเป็นใจ
Text.Desc: This person is born with all the favor from heaven and earth, an absolute chosen one.

Text.Name: YinBody
Text.Desc: This person is of pure Yin energy and has a short lifespan, but is extremely charming and attractive, especially gifted for cultivation.

Text.Name: YangBody
Text.Desc: This person is of pure Yang and has a long lifespan, born to be competitive and charming. However, he has a hard time adjusting his own mental state.

Text.Name: Cleanliness
Text.Desc: This person likes to keep things clean.

Text.Name: Slovenly
Text.Desc: This person is very untidy.

Text.Name: DragonBlood
Text.DisplayName: เลือดมังกร
Text.Desc: This person has a little dragon's blood coursing through veins, making [IT] stronger and more sensitive than others. However, the savageness inherited from ancestors makes it easier for [IT] to lose control.

Text.Name: DemonBlood
Text.DisplayName: เลือดปีศาจ
Text.Desc: This person has a little demon blood coursing through veins, making [IT] more sensitive to inner พลังชี่. However, it also makes this one's mental state more susceptible to changes.

Text.Name: Realization
Text.Desc: Although this person does not know that they were reincarnated, this one is still born with a natural awareness that makes [IT] better focused on the current life.

Text.Name: Retarded
Text.Desc: Trait for mentally challenged person.

Text.Name: LunHui_1
Text.DisplayName: ช่างสังเกต
Text.Desc: This person is quick to notice things, very observant.

Text.Name: LunHui_2
Text.Desc: This person is blessed and has better-than-average Intelligence.

Text.Name: LunHui_3
Text.Desc: This person is bent on practicing Taoism and can endure more hardship than others.

Text.Name: LunHui_4
Text.DisplayName: กระปรี้กระเปร่า
Text.Desc: This person is gifted with unfailing energy that staying up late is not a big deal for them.

Text.Name: LunHui_5
Text.Desc: This person walks very slow, slower than you'd expect.

Text.Name: LunHui_6
Text.DisplayName: เดินทางข้ามเวลา
Text.Desc: Time-traveling has granted this person a long lifespan and a body that can stand harsh weather like extreme cold or heat.

Text.Name: LunHui_7
Text.DisplayName: เลือดฟินิกซ์
Text.Desc: This person is born with the phoenix blood, but it was meaningless in a modern society where cultivation Laws no longer exist.

Text.Name: LunHui_8
Text.Desc: Modern knowledge and mindset has made [IT] extremely special in this realm, but it also means that this one cannot handle many types of work in the old times. Meanwhile, a modern mind means that this one cannot fall in love with anybody in this realm.

Text.Name: LunHui_9
Text.DisplayName: เที่ยงธรรม
Text.Desc: This person is born with good virtues, and the gods are very generous toward them.

Text.Name: LunHui_10
Text.Desc: Modern knowledge and mindset makes [IT] more intelligent than others, but this one's aversion toward feudal superstition means that it is very difficult for [IT] to cultivate.

Text.Name: LunHui_11
Text.Desc: This one is used to hiding their own existence due to a modern life, and their little presence is even ignored by heaven in this realm, so this one is born with less attainment. This one is used to modern lifestyle, which deprives them of the capability of handling many types of work in the old times. This one is bent on returning to their own realm through ascension, having no intention to have any relationship here.

Text.Name: LunHui_12
Text.DisplayName: เด็ดเดี่ยว
Text.Desc: This person went through extreme training for decades to make up for their lack of natural attainment, laying a solid foundation for practice. These experience means that this person can endure more hardship than others.

Text.Name: LunHui_13
Text.Desc: This one does not hurry to complete tasks, oftentimes wandering in the streets.

Text.Name: LunHui_14
Text.Desc: A lifestyle of office work has made him ill-suited for physical work. However, a rich imagination means that he can quickly blend in with the rest of the world.

Text.Name: LunHui_15
Text.DisplayName: ศักยภาพแอบแฝง
Text.Desc: This person is endowed with a special body due to his experience cultivating in an evil Law, making it harder for him to train his foundation, but his potential far exceeds others.

Text.Name: LunHui_16
Text.DisplayName: สวรรค์ก้าวก่าย
Text.Desc: This person once had a vision from the gods, changing their trait and prolonging their lifespan.

Text.Name: LunHui_17
Text.DisplayName: เกิดมาเพื่อดาบ
Text.Desc: This person is extremely obsessed with swords and almost seems to have been born for swords.

Text.Name: LunHui_18
Text.Desc: A long-time modern lifestyle has made him physically weak, but he has an open view of the world and a progressive mind.

Text.Name: LunHui_19
Text.Desc: This person has learned swift movement from flying minks, which makes him move much faster than usual.

Text.Name: LunHui_20
Text.Desc: This person is very gallant, making it easy for them to gain favor from others.

Text.Name: LunHui_21
Text.Desc: This person is reckless and crude, easy to provoke.

Text.Name: LunHui_22
Text.Desc: This person is very timid and cautious.

Text.Name: LunHui_23
Text.DisplayName: คล่องแคล่ว
Text.Desc: This person is very agile and moves in quick speed.

Text.Name: LunHui_24
Text.Desc: This person likes to sleep and easily gets drowsy.

Text.Name: LunHui_25
Text.Desc: This person has the elegance and knowledge of an intellectual in Wei and Jin dynasties, charming in their own way.

Text.Name: LunHui_26
Text.Desc: This person is obsessed with bones.

Text.Name: LunHui_27
Text.Desc: This one is skilled in catching fish, sharp-eyed and fast-moving.

Text.Name: LunHui_28
Text.DisplayName: เสียงไพเราะ
Text.Desc: This person's singing voice is as beautiful and magical as the mythical siren.

Text.Name: LunHui_29
Text.Desc: A person with a sensitive heart rich in emotions, [IT] possesses an unparalleled imagination.

Text.Name: LunHui_30
Text.Desc: This person is at ease with themselves, always looks carefree and confident, and never shows any signs of panic.

Text.Name: LunHui_31
Text.Desc: This person is usually the scapegoat, thus liked by all.

Text.Name: LunHui_32
Text.Desc: This person is born lucky, envied by others.

Text.Name: LunHui_33
Text.Desc: This person is very sadistic.

Text.Name: LunHui_34
Text.Desc: This person is born with luck and fortune.

Text.Name: LunHui_35
Text.Desc: This person loves animals and cannot do any hunting.

Text.Name: LunHui_36
Text.DisplayName: รู้เทคโนโลยี
Text.Desc: This person holds the core of future technology, making them more efficient at work and move faster.

Text.Name: LunHui_37
Text.Desc: A boss well liked by all their employees.

Text.Name: LunHui_38
Text.Desc: This person is an agile and heroic outlaw who always seeks justice.

Text.Name: LunHui_39
Text.Desc: This person can endure more hardship than others, like extreme cold and heat, and is agile with a long lifespan.

Text.Name: LunHui_40
Text.DisplayName: ย้ำคิดย้ำทำ
Text.Desc: This person has OCD, and it takes them a long time to complete tasks, but the result is usually good.

Text.Name: LunHui_41
Text.Desc: This person is chivalrous and straightforward, gaining favor from others instantly.

Text.Name: LunHui_42
Text.DisplayName: พ่อครัวตัวเก่ง
Text.Desc: This person is gifted in cooking.

Text.Name: LunHui_43
Text.DisplayName: ต้องดีที่สุด
Text.Desc: This person is a perfectionist, and it takes them a long time to complete tasks, but the result is usually good.

Text.Name: LunHui_44
Text.DisplayName: เป็นทุกอย่าง
Text.Desc: This person is interested in everything and happy to do anything.

Text.Name: LunHui_45
Text.DisplayName: เหมือนกิ้งก่า
Text.Desc: This person is very agile and swift with sharp eyes.

Text.Name: LunHui_46
Text.DisplayName: นักแปลงเสียงตัวเอง
Text.Desc: This person does not like to speak, only communicating with others through ventriloquism.

Text.Name: LunHui_47
Text.Desc: This person is born to be a wanderer in this world.

Text.Name: LunHui_48
Text.DisplayName: เป็นที่รัก
Text.Desc: This person is naturally beloved by all.

Text.Name: LunHui_49
Text.DisplayName: เสียความทรงจำ
Text.Desc: This person has lost memories and only enjoys living in the moment.

Text.Name: LunHui_50
Text.Desc: จิ๊บ ๆ

Text.Name: LunHui_51
Text.DisplayName: มีพรสวรรค์
Text.Desc: This person is incredibly gifted and can withstand extreme cold and heat, fairly suitable for cultivation.

Text.Name: LunHui_52
Text.Desc: This person is cursed and destined to be bothered by hemorrhoids forever.

Text.Name: LunHui_53
Text.DisplayName: ขี้เกียจสุด ๆ
Text.Desc: I can't do hard work. There is no way no matter what!

Text.Name: LunHui_54
Text.DisplayName: ครบเครื่อง
Text.Desc: This person is incredibly well endowed.

Text.Name: LunHui_55
Text.DisplayName: ไม่หลับไม่นอน
Text.Desc: This person has been watching the night sky for a long time, and learned how to keep awake for almost all night long.

Text.Name: LunHui_56
Text.DisplayName: ชักชวนเก่ง
Text.Desc: This person is very persuasive, skilled at smooth talk.

Text.Name: LunHui_57
Text.Desc: This person is incredibly gifted, fairly suitable for cultivation.

Text.Name: LunHui_58
Text.DisplayName: ประสบการณ์ชีวิตเยอะ
Text.Desc: Others hold this person in high regard for their real-life experience.

Text.Name: LunHui_59
Text.DisplayName: นับถือวิทยาศาสตร์
Text.Desc: This person's experience with science has filled them with faith.

Text.Name: LunHui_60
Text.DisplayName: มีพรสวรรค์
Text.Desc: This person is incredibly gifted, smart and a quick learner.

Text.Name: LunHui_61
Text.Desc: This person is a skilled doctor who dedicates their time to saving people's life.

Text.Name: LunHui_62
Text.DisplayName: ฝึกฝนบ้าคลั่ง
Text.Desc: This person is obsessed with cultivation and practices for over 15 hours a day, as if they've gone mad.

Text.Name: LunHui_63
Text.DisplayName: นักประดิษย์
Text.Desc: This person is incredibly gifted and crafts items of good quality.

Text.Name: LunHui_65
Text.DisplayName: ผู้รู้เรื่องยันต์
Text.Desc: This person has drawn numerous talismans by hand, known as 'Master of Talisman Drawing'.

Text.Name: LunHui_66
Text.DisplayName: สาวสวยหน้าอกใหญ่
Text.Desc: This person is beautiful and has big breasts, very charismatic.

Text.Name: LunHui_67
Text.Desc: This person is a masterful doctor who can almost revive the dead.

Text.Name: LunHui_Kong_1
Text.Desc: This person is very difficult, embarrassed to voice their concern to other people.

Text.Name: LunHui_Kong_2
Text.Desc: This person's spitefulness often leaves others speechless.

Text.Name: LunHui_Kong_3
Text.Desc: This person is very honorable.

Text.Name: LunHui_Kong_4
Text.Desc: This person is so scheming that they don't trust anybody.

Text.Name: LunHui_Kong_5
Text.Desc: This person is confident, free-spirited and loves singing.

Text.Name: LunHui_Kong_6
Text.Desc: This person has a determined mind that can help fight the befuddlement in cultivation.

Text.Name: LunHui_Kong_7
Text.DisplayName: เสียงน่ารัก
Text.Desc: This person has a lovely voice that soothes people in spite of themselves.

Text.Name: LunHui_Kong_8
Text.Desc: This person has always been reticent and withdrawn.

Text.Name: LunHui_Kong_9
Text.DisplayName: อายุขัยเพิ่ม

Text.Name: LunHui_Kong_10
Text.DisplayName: แสดงละครเก่ง
Text.Desc: This person is an incredibly gifted actor.

Text.Name: LunHui_Kong_11
Text.DisplayName: อายุขัยเพิ่มขึ้นอีก
Text.Desc: This person is very nosy and likes to pry into anything.

Text.Name: LunHui_Kong_12
Text.DisplayName: อายุขัยเพิ่มขึ้นอีก

Text.Name: LunHui_Kong_13
Text.DisplayName: อายุขัยเพิ่มขึ้นอีกมาก
Text.Desc: This person's unique destiny allows him to alter the gods' plan. He seems to be forgotten by heaven and has an incredibly long natural lifespan.

Text.Name: LunHui_Kong_14
Text.Desc: Nickname between Taoists in online streams.

Text.Name: LunHui_Kong_15
Text.DisplayName: นักพากษ์ยอดนิยม
Text.Desc: This person is extremely charismatic, who has gained many followers and fans by commentating for others.

Text.Name: Inborn_Jin_lost
Text.Desc: Learning of Metal Laws becomes harder, and more prone to suffer Fire damage.

Text.Name: Inborn_Mu_lost
Text.Desc: Learning of Wood Laws becomes harder, and more prone to suffer Metal damage.

Text.Name: Inborn_Shui_lost
Text.Desc: Learning of Water Laws becomes harder, and more prone to suffer Earth damage.

Text.Name: Inborn_Huo_lost
Text.Desc: Learning of Fire Laws becomes harder, and more prone to suffer Water damage.

Text.Name: Inborn_Tu_lost
Text.Desc: Learning of Earth Laws becomes harder, and more prone to suffer Wood damage.

Text.Name: Inborn_Jin_Add
Text.Desc: Learning of Metal Laws becomes easier, and more resistant to Wood damage.

Text.Name: Inborn_Mu_Add
Text.Desc: Learning of Wood Laws becomes easier, and more resistant to Earth damage.

Text.Name: Inborn_Shui_Add
Text.Desc: Learning of Water Laws becomes easier, and more resistant to Fire damage.

Text.Name: Inborn_Huo_Add
Text.Desc: Learning of Fire Laws becomes easier, and more resistant to Metal damage.

Text.Name: Inborn_Tu_Add
Text.Desc: Learning of Earth Laws becomes easier, and more resistant to Water damage.

Text.Name: Features_JingGuai_0
Text.DisplayName: วิญญาณรับรู้
Text.Desc: Originally a lifeless object in the world, but generated consciousness due to some accidental inspiration. With a very undisciplined nature, it is hard for it indulge into meditation and learning. But on the other hand, its simple-mindedness also makes it hard to get distracted by stray thoughts or obsessions. From a certain point of view, it is a first-class cultivator's mind.

Text.Name: Features_JingGuai_1
Text.DisplayName: วิญญาณรับรู้(หิน)
Text.Desc: It was originally a spirit stone that became sentient, thus was naturally born with a higher Base พลังชี่.

Text.Name: Features_JingGuai_2
Text.DisplayName: วิญญาณรับรู้(ของกิน)
Text.Desc: It was originally an edible food that became sentient, thus was naturally born with very high พลังชี่ Absorption capabilities and does not feel hunger.

Text.Name: Features_JingGuai_3
Text.DisplayName: วิญญาณรับรู้(ของวิเศษ)
Text.Desc: It was originally an artifact that became sentient, thus was naturally more proficient in Artifact Mastery.
